meanings.definition: The hard, dense bony tissue forming the bulk of a tooth beneath the enamel.
meanings.sent1: The dentist explained that the dentins are the main part of a tooth.
meanings.sent2: I learned in school that dentins make up most of the tooth structure.
meanings.sent3: The dentins in the tooth were having a party, but the enamel was not invited.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as strong as dentins, unwavering and resilient.
meanings.sent5: The dentist showed me a model of dentins, emphasizing their importance in dental health.
